mutants.code:
from typing import List

def generate_combinations(items: List[int]) -> List[List[int]]:
    result = []
    n = len(items)
    for i in range(2 << n):
        combination = [items[j] for j in range(n) if i & 1 << j]
        result.append(combination)
    return result

def generate_combinations(items: List[int]) -> List[List[int]]:
